title: Why do we must write our own books? - Quora

response.answer_text: “Why do we must write our own books?” We do must write our own books because if not we do write our own books then we would not do write our books. Then books would not get do written. Seriously though, what the absolute hell is that grammar? Try: “Why must we write our own books?” We have to write our own books, because otherwise, no one else will write them. We have stories within us that no one else can tell in the way we will tell them; and as such, if we don’t write them, then no one will.
